Idea Description: It's a transformer car cum robo. A car which can transform into a robot, it's motion is controlled wirelessly. With applications in search & rescue, military, and autonomous mobility, this project pushes the boundaries of robotics and intelligent automation.
Team Members and Roles: Karmveer Kumar, Harpinder Singh, Rakesh Soni, Apoorv Kumar Jha, Sumedha Mukherjee, Aakanksha Singh

Idea Description: Monitors real-time electricity usage and displays it on a mobile app, helping users track and reduce energy consumption.
Team Members and Roles: Sreemoyee Mukhopadhyay, Anwesha De, Vasundhara Bose, Soumodipta Sen, Srijita Ghosh, AKRITI KUMARI

Idea Description: This project aims to develop a high-security EVM that ensures authentic voting through dual biometric authentication. The system will only unlock when both the voter and the assigned government officer authenticate using fingerprint recognition. \n\nThe EVM recordsoperates on a battery backup to ensure reliability during power failures. This system enhances election security, prevents fraud, and ensures inclusive voting access for all citizens
Team Members and Roles: Anwesha Banerjee, Dipanjana Pal, S K Aman, Muhammad Asad Rahmani, Pritam Das, Anirban Ghosh

Idea Description: Our IoT project is a retro-futuristic interactive robot that enhances human-robot connection. Featuring animatronic eyes that track and maintain eye contact, it responds to queries, with its audio waves visualized on a CRT TV mouth. This project reimagines classic robotics' vision of the future, making interactions more personal and engaging.
Team Members and Roles: Syed Musharaf Hossain, Sayan Ghosh, Poulami Das, Debojit Chowdhury, Tandrima Chatterjee, Anmol Kumar singh

Idea Description: This project aims to develop a custom IoT-enabled model rocket with a propulsion system and a controlled landing mechanism. The rocket will follow a straight trajectory and safely land near the launch pad using deployable landing legs. It will incorporate solid fuel propulsion for ascent, onboard sensors (IMU, GPS, barometer) for flight stability, and servo-controlled landing gear for a smooth touchdown. An IoT module will enable real-time telemetry tracking and post-flight analysis. The goal is to create a reusable, stable, and smart model rocket, combining aerodynamics, electronics, and IoT for precision-controlled launches and landings.
Team Members and Roles: Siddharth Sundram, Pallavi Kumari, Gaurav Kumar Kundan, Saptarshi Chowdhary, Ankita Das, Anwesha Banerjee

Idea Description: An AI-powered application for generating comprehensive patient medical reports from doctor's handwritten notes, speech-to-text input, and medical records, ensuring accuracy and efficiency. The tool will leverage NLP for context and intent recognition, and a large language model to create well-structured reports.
Team Members and Roles: Shreosi Saha, Anjali Kumari, Anwesha Adhikary, Sudipa Guchhait, Parna Bhattacharya, Syed Syeem Hussain

Idea Description: The Tech Titans is a robotic cleaning machine designed to clean walls, windows, and floors. It features an advanced navigation system with sensors for obstacle avoidance and edge detection.
Team Members and Roles: Ankit Paul, Avisek Patra, Sayanwita Dey, Chandrani Chakraborty, Shreya Kundu, Sneha Raj

Idea Description: Our project is an AI-powered supply chain optimization tool for perishable goods. It utilizes real-time data from IoT sensors, weather forecasts, and market demand to predict spoilage risk and optimize transportation routes and storage conditions, reducing food waste and improving profitability for farmers and distributors.
Team Members and Roles: Pallavi Kumari, Siddharth Sundram, Gaurav Kumar Kundan, Ankita Das, Anwesha Banerjee, Saptarshi Chowdhary

Idea Description: GreenGuard is an IoT-enabled system that monitors and controls agricultural conditions. It uses sensors to track soil moisture, temperature, and humidity, automating irrigation and ventilation to ensure optimal crop health and maximize yield with minimal resource usage.
Team Members and Roles: Bhumi Sharma, Saharsh Sharma, Shubham Kumar Misra, Vishal Kumar Roy, Ritu Raj, Samiksha Kumari

Idea Description: SafeRoute is a smart helmet with integrated IoT features. It includes an alcohol sensor that disables the ignition if the driver is impaired, a GPS tracker for location sharing, and an emergency notification system that alerts contacts and emergency services in case of an accident.
Team Members and Roles: Syed Musharaf Hossain, Sayan Ghosh, Poulami Das, Tandrima Chatterjee, Anmol Kumar singh, Debojit Chowdhury

Idea Description: An IoT-based smart recycling bin that uses sensors to identify waste types, sorts them into appropriate compartments, and notifies municipal services when full, streamlining the recycling process and improving waste management efficiency.
Team Members and Roles: Ankit Paul, Avisek Patra, Sayanwita Dey, Chandrani Chakraborty, Sneha Raj, Shreya Kundu

Idea Description: Crop-Protect AI is an image-based deep learning solution for early detection and classification of crop diseases. Farmers can upload images of affected plants, and the AI provides an instant diagnosis and treatment recommendation, minimizing crop loss and ensuring food security.
Team Members and Roles: Syed Musharaf Hossain, Sayan Ghosh, Poulami Das, Debojit Chowdhury, Anmol Kumar singh, Tandrima Chatterjee

Idea Description: A network of low-cost IoT sensors deployed across a city to monitor air quality in real time (PM2.5, PM10, CO2, etc.). The data is visualized on a public dashboard, providing granular, hyper-local pollution insights to inform citizens and policy-makers.
Team Members and Roles: Karmveer Kumar, Harpinder Singh, Rakesh Soni, Sumedha Mukherjee, Aakanksha Singh, Apoorv Kumar Jha

Idea Description: An integrated, cloud-based smart home security system. It features facial recognition for keyless entry, motion-activated cameras, and door/window sensors, all managed via a single mobile application with instant alerts for suspicious activity.
Team Members and Roles: Tuna santra, Syed Musharaf Hossain, Sudipa Guchhait, Sayanwita Dey, Parna Bhattacharya, Rishita Das

Idea Description: AgriSense is a drone-based, multispectral imaging system for precision agriculture. It monitors crop health, identifies areas needing attention, and calculates optimal fertilizer and water distribution, leading to higher yields and reduced resource waste.
Team Members and Roles: Ankit Paul, Sayanwita Dey, Chandrani Chakraborty, Shreya Kundu, Sneha Raj, Avisek Patra

Idea Description: A telehealth platform that connects patients in remote areas with specialists. It facilitates video consultations and secure transmission of patient vitals collected via wearable IoT devices, overcoming geographical barriers to healthcare access.
Team Members and Roles: Karmveer Kumar, Harpinder Singh, Rakesh Soni, Apoorv Kumar Jha, Aakanksha Singh, Sumedha Mukherjee

Idea Description: An energy-efficient street lighting system that uses motion sensors and ambient light detectors to adjust brightness. Lights dim when no activity is detected and brighten when a pedestrian or vehicle approaches, saving energy and extending bulb life.
Team Members and Roles: Shreosi Saha, Anjali Kumari, Sudipa Guchhait, Parna Bhattacharya, Syed Syeem Hussain, Anwesha Adhikary

Idea Description: A wearable panic button and fall detection device for the elderly. It automatically detects a fall or can be manually triggered, sending a GPS location and alert to pre-set emergency contacts and caregivers immediately.
Team Members and Roles: Anjali Kumari, Anwesha Adhikary, Sudipa Guchhait, Parna Bhattacharya, Syed Syeem Hussain, Shreosi Saha

Idea Description: An IoT device for real-time monitoring of drinking water quality (pH, turbidity, dissolved oxygen, etc.) in reservoirs and homes. Alerts are sent to users and authorities if contamination is detected.
Team Members and Roles: Anwesha Banerjee, Dipanjana Pal, S K Aman, Muhammad Asad Rahmani, Anirban Ghosh, Pritam Das

Idea Description: An intelligent parking management system that uses ground sensors and a mobile app to guide drivers to available spots in real-time, reducing congestion and search time in urban areas.
Team Members and Roles: Sreemoyee Mukhopadhyay, Anwesha De, Vasundhara Bose, Soumodipta Sen, AKRITI KUMARI, Srijita Ghosh

Idea Description: A city-wide network of sensors that continuously measures and maps noise levels. The data is used to identify high-noise zones and inform urban planning strategies to mitigate sound pollution.
Team Members and Roles: Karmveer Kumar, Harpinder Singh, Apoorv Kumar Jha, Sumedha Mukherjee, Aakanksha Singh, Rakesh Soni

Idea Description: A small GPS-enabled collar for pets that tracks location, monitors activity levels, and alerts owners if the pet strays beyond a geo-fenced safe zone or shows unusual behavior patterns.
Team Members and Roles: Sreemoyee Mukhopadhyay, Anwesha De, Soumodipta Sen, Srijita Ghosh, AKRITI KUMARI, Vasundhara Bose

Idea Description: An AI-powered, empathetic chatbot offering initial mental health support, stress reduction techniques, and referrals to human professionals based on user conversation analysis.
Team Members and Roles: Shreosi Saha, Anwesha Adhikary, Sudipa Guchhait, Parna Bhattacharya, Syed Syeem Hussain, Anjali Kumari

Idea Description: A drone equipped with thermal and visual cameras, GPS, and a communication relay system, designed for rapid deployment in disaster zones to assess damage, locate victims, and provide temporary network coverage.
Team Members and Roles: Sreemoyee Mukhopadhyay, Anwesha De, Vasundhara Bose, Srijita Ghosh, AKRITI KUMARI, Soumodipta Sen

Idea Description: An IoT-enabled collection box that identifies types of e-waste using a camera/sensor array and provides a small incentive (like digital points) for proper disposal, aiming to improve e-waste recycling rates.
Team Members and Roles: Ankit Paul, Avisek Patra, Sayanwita Dey, Shreya Kundu, Sneha Raj, Chandrani Chakraborty

Idea Description: An adaptive traffic light system that uses real-time traffic flow data from sensors and cameras to dynamically adjust light timings, reducing congestion and travel time in busy intersections.
Team Members and Roles: Karmveer Kumar, Rakesh Soni, Apoorv Kumar Jha, Sumedha Mukherjee, Aakanksha Singh, Harpinder Singh

Idea Description: A machine learning model that predicts the output of solar and wind farms based on real-time weather data and historical performance, helping energy grid operators manage supply fluctuations.
Team Members and Roles: Syed Musharaf Hossain, Poulami Das, Debojit Chowdhury, Tandrima Chatterjee, Anmol Kumar singh, Sayan Ghosh

Idea Description: A smart mirror that uses a depth-sensing camera and AI to analyze and correct the user's form during exercises, providing real-time audio and visual feedback.
Team Members and Roles: Anwesha Banerjee, S K Aman, Muhammad Asad Rahmani, Pritam Das, Anirban Ghosh, Dipanjana Pal

Idea Description: An interactive remote learning platform with virtual whiteboards, real-time collaboration tools, and AI tutors to provide personalized, engaging educational experiences for students everywhere.
Team Members and Roles: Anwesha Banerjee, Dipanjana Pal, S K Aman, Pritam Das, Anirban Ghosh, Muhammad Asad Rahmani

Idea Description: An industrial IoT solution for monitoring machine health (vibration, temperature, power consumption) in factories. It predicts potential failures before they occur, enabling preventative maintenance and reducing downtime.
Team Members and Roles: Anwesha Banerjee, Dipanjana Pal, Muhammad Asad Rahmani, Pritam Das, Anirban Ghosh, S K Aman

Idea Description: A secure, blockchain-based system for tracking and managing high-value digital assets, ensuring transparency, provenance, and preventing unauthorized use.
Team Members and Roles: Syed Musharaf Hossain, Sayan Ghosh, Debojit Chowdhury, Tandrima Chatterjee, Anmol Kumar singh, Poulami Das

Idea Description:
Newborn theft and unauthorized movement in hospitals pose serious security risks, especially in small hospitals lacking advanced tracking systems. Manual monitoring and CCTV surveillance often fail to prevent abductions. 

SafeNest is a simple yet powerful technological solution that helps track babies and offers a smart security solution for infants and mothers. Using secure wearable bands, it ensures correct mother-infant matching and prevents abductions. It triggers instant alerts if a baby is moved beyond a secure zone or if the band is removed. It provides monitoring via a centralized dashboard.

SafeNest enhances hospital security, reduces risks, and provides peace of mind.
Team Members and Roles: Siddhartha Kumar Majumdar, Shreyosi Sen, Samriddhi Roy, Anwesha Roy, Omdeep Roy Chowdhury, Titli Mukherjee

Idea Description: To improve road safety, the Smart IoT-Based Car Safety System incorporates a blackbox recorder, alcohol detection, brake monitoring, and collision notifications. It uses sensors (acceleration, temperature, vibration, alcohol, brake fluid, GPS, and GSM) to identify accidents, drunk driving, and brake failures in real time. It sends emergency notifications, disables the engine, and logs crash data to the cloud if an issue is found. Reducing road deaths, this affordable, real-time IoT device guarantees forensic data collection, emergency response, and accident avoidance.
Team Members and Roles: Sayan Ghosh, Poulami Das, Debojit Chowdhury, Tandrima Chatterjee, Anmol Kumar singh, Syed Musharaf Hossain

Idea Description: An AR-powered mobile app that offers interactive virtual tours of historical sites and museums. Users can point their camera at an object to see superimposed information, 3D reconstructions, and narrated histories.
Team Members and Roles: Shreosi Saha, Anjali Kumari, Anwesha Adhikary, Sudipa Guchhait, Syed Syeem Hussain, Parna Bhattacharya
